action.action-desc: Mr. Huizenga of Michigan (for himself, Mr. Royce, Mr. David Scott of Georgia, Mr. Meeks, Mr. Clay, Mr. Stivers, Mr. Peters of Michigan, and Mr. Bachus) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to improve upon the definitions provided for points and fees in connection with a mortgage transaction.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Consumer Mortgage Choice Act.

subsection.text: Section 103(bb)(4) of the Truth in Lending Act (15 U.S.C. 1602(bb)(4)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking except interest or the time-price differential and inserting the following:

clause.text: interest and the time-price differential; and

the amount of any loan level price adjustment payment set by the Federal National Mortgage Association, the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation, the Federal Housing Administration, or similar governmental entity or government-sponsored enterprise

paragraph.text: by striking subparagraph (B) and inserting the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: all compensation paid directly by a consumer to a mortgage originator, including a mortgage originator that is also the creditor in a table-funded transaction, but not including compensation paid by a mortgage originator or a creditor to an individual employed by the mortgage originator or creditor
by inserting and insurance after taxes;

in clause (ii), by inserting , except as retained by a creditor or its affiliate as a result of their participation in an affiliated business arrangement (as defined in section 2(7) of the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974 (12 U.S.C. 2602(7)) after compensation; and
by striking clause (iii) and inserting the following:

subclause.text: a bona fide third-party charge not retained by the mortgage originator, creditor, or an affiliate of the creditor or mortgage originator; or
a charge set forth in section 106(e)(1);

subparagraph.text: by striking or any payments and inserting and any payments.

subsection.text: Section 129C of the Truth in Lending Act (15 U.S.C. 1639c) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(5)(C), by striking 103 and all that follows through or mortgage originator and inserting 103(bb)(4); and
in subsection (b)(2)(C)(i), by striking 103 and all that follows through or mortgage originator) and inserting 103(bb)(4).
